intro.headline:
We develop
the polyPod -
intro.bodyText:
With the support of our members, we continuously improve the polyPod. Together, we want to enforce what we are entitled to: Our right to privacy!

Curious to see where this goes? The next steps:
explore.headline: Explore
explore.bodyText: In step one, you can explore data streams. Find out how companies handle data, what they collect, and with whom it is shared.
know.headline: Know
know.bodyText: In step two, you will see what data companies keep about you. Take your data into your polyPod and start to manage it there.
correct.headline: Correct
correct.bodyText: In step three, you can correct data companies keep about you. Gradually delete data that is incorrect, or that you don't want to share.
control.headline: Control
control.bodyText: In step four, you can use more and more applications without surrendering your data. Decide who gets to access your data, at any time.
earn.headline: Rent out
earn.bodyText: In step five, you can begin to earn money with your data, if you want to. Rent out your data to whoever you want, for as long as you want.
outro.headline:
Help out!
Become a
outro.bodyText: Help us develop the polyPod further. Become a shareholder of polypoly - The Cooperative - and thus a co-owner of the polyPod.
